title: Snowdown Shop
body: So I main Draven i played a lot of games with him and I have biggest mastery with him.. Am i going to get his skin in snowdown shop??

replies.body:
Why did I get three skins for one champion.

Two skins for the other one, and some irrelevant other skin?


(( volibear x3, jinx x2, and a tirst skin ))

*Copying my response from your other post*

It's possible, but it's not guaranteed, as there's a bunch of different methods we use to find content relevant to you. Keep in mind, it's not just who you main, but it takes into account various aspects of your playstyle.
When is the shop supposed to go live? {{item:3157}}
Looks like you're on NA - should be good to go.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/NM5n3OH6-all-snowdown-shop-turn-out-to-be-the-same

Any response for about this? 
Please tell us something! i have a active account for this problem, my friend and other players in this server!
Sounds odd. Did they go through each skin and give it tags like "aggressive", "passive", "funny"? If someone who worked on that could give us some insight, that'd be really neat.
Unfortunately, I'm not able to share much more than it's based off playstyle, not just a particular champion you play a lot.

So, say if you're like me and have a "I must SAVE my ally!" mentality and run into a 2v5 to try and do so (even when I'm playing a squishy champion... ESPECIALLY when I'm playing a squishy champ), the shop might involve a lot of champions with good peeling capabilities, or some kind of disruptive, AoE tank. Would it do so even if I hadn't played any Supportive Tanks lately?

Or is that something you're not able to share?
I'm not able to share. Sorry! D:

I think you guys need to tweak your playstyle detection software. I only got one tank skin in my shop, and I play tanky initiators almost exclusively(partial exception being Wukong). I got two MF skins and I avoid the ADC role like the plague. Not to mention she's not exactly a teamfight initiator :P

:( sorry to post on two of your comments but i just found this one. i really think in the future you guys should do it randomly, 1. a lot of people play multiple roles so getting a bunch of jungler skins doesnt make me want to throw my wallet at the screen than say 2 jungler skins 2 mid skins an adc skins and a support skin. as well as i stated on the other post if you gives skins for a champ we mastered then its likely we already have a much better skins for them, for example i got acolyte lee sin as one of mine but i have every other lee skin and think acolyte is ugly. or ionia yi but i have project yi, woad king darius when i have dunkmaster, academy ekko when i have sandstorm and debonair ez when i have pulsefire, dont mean to sound ranty and again it may just be i had bad luck but under the logci that i get skins for champs that are around my playstyle means im just offered strictly worse skins than i already have, it woulda been fine if you picked champs i dont have skins for then it woulda made some sense. and from what ive read a lot of people shops are like this, they are getting offered skins for champs they have mastered and already have the best skins for, or they have 2-3 skins for that champ and i guess riot thought that they wanted to have the skins for that champ? i guess rant aside my advice would be to in the future either do skins for champs u dont have a skin on/ a skin that is more expensive than the skin you own for that champ, or 2. make all of them completely random. for me this was a fail and i wont be buying any skins but im sure ppl who dont have a lot of skins like me will use this so im sure some good will come from it :)

Can you convince them to extend the feature into mid January?
I'm not going to be around to take advantage of it like I hoped to.

I got three Xin Zhao skins on sale (already have two Xin Zhao skins), one Jarvan IV skin (already have two Jarvan IV skins), and two Darius skins (already have two Darius skins, including the legendary). I feel a bit disappointed. Wouldn't it make more sense to offer me skins for champions that I only have one or zero skins for? Especially if I already have 1350 RP/1820 RP/Limited Edition skins?
